text: Hello! 🙂 Let's work together on a deal for these packages, shall we? What are you most interested in? Hey! I'd like some more firewood to keep my doggo warm. What do you need? I need firewood as well. We have a large group consisting of mostly senior citizens, including my grandma, so we'd like the firewood to keep everyone warm. I see. 😮 What are you least interested in? We can make do without extra water. Can we trade two waters for an extra firewood package and an extra food package? We could do without the water as well. I'm willing to trade you 3 firewood for 3 food and 2 waters We need some firewood too, though! ☹️ Let's try to make a deal that benefits us both! 🙂 Could I have 1 firewood, 3 food, and 3 waters? I meant I would give you my firewood, what would you trade in return? Oh sorry for the confusion. 😮 In that case, thank you for the generosity! 🙂 How about if I have 3 firewood, 1 food, and 1 water? I can do that for 3 food and 3 water? I think we're close. Let's shake hands on this: 3 firewood, 1 food for me, and then 2 food and 3 water for you. I'll make sure your food packages have extra doggy treats! 🙂 Is that a deal? Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello. How are you? I am good. I am pretty excited for the trip this weekend. what about you? Very excited. It will be fun. Yes, Hopefully the weather holds up. So I was thinking, i am bringning my two kids along with me, and they will need food, so I was thinking i could take the three foods, and either one of the firewood or water, up to you. I would also like a little extra food for my kids. Maybe we can split it somehow? Ok, I am willing to give you one food, in exchange for two firewoods, that would mean you get 3 waters, 1 food and 1 firewood. you get 5 items, while i get 4. If I only get 1 food, than I would like 2 firewood. So you get 2 food, 1 firewood, and 1 water. No i do not need water, as i am camping near a potable stream. I would like 2 firewood. It is only fair that i get two firewood, since you are getting more supplies (5), i think i should be able to choose what 4 i should get. No, if you get 2 food, it's only fair that I get 2 firewood.  Then i will take 3 waters, and 2 food. Okay I will take all the firewood and 1 food. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hey there! Hi! How are you?! You excited for your camping trip??! I sure am ready to go on mine! I am very excited, I'm actually going camping in a week. I drink a lot of water so it's important that I bring a lot. What about you? I really am! I have been watching the weather and updates about the area I will be traveling to.  They are experiencing a severe drought, so I will be in need of some extra water as well! I planned on staying an extra couple days as well.  There is a stream nearby I believe, but I'm not sure how much it has dried up. That's good to hear, you always have to be careful with wild water though, it has all kind of germs. Sounds like you'll have plenty of dry firewood though.  Yes, I would be willing to let you have all the firewood for 2 of the cases of water.  How much food were you needing? I like your water and firewood arrangement. Can I have 2 of the food since you're getting 2 of the water?  Let me think on that. I know there won't be much for berries or small animals to hunt for.  Is where you are going have much available for you to hunt and scavenge for? It might but with the summer season hunting isn't exactly legal at the moment. I tend to camp in remote areas so going to the store for more food isn't really an option. I've already let you have extra water so I don't think it's too far of a stretch to let me have some extra food. Okay, I can let you have 2 of the food then.  I do appreciate your generosity on the extra water.   Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi, I'd like 3 packages of food. I have diabetes and my blood sugar could drop. oh dear, I am sorry to hear that my son is type one, I am okay with giving you all the food if you could give me all the firewood. I have hypothyroidism and it makes me get cold. That's a deal.  now how to split the water, wish it wasn't an odd number I'll take 1 and you can have 2 since you gave me all the food. Oh that is nice of you! I appreciate that very much! We do enjoy a good hike, so water will be good! Sounds like we are set. yeah, I hope you have a nice time camping! weather should be nice! I hope it will be because I don't love camping! Hope you have fun too! Have a nice day 🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

What are you most interested in getting? I think food is my highest priority, What about you? Food is also my highest priority, but firewood is also pretty close for me. Would you be willing to take more firewood for less food? Yes I think that sounds fair. So if I take 2 foods and 1 firewood, you take 1 food and 2 firewood. What would be fair for water? What if I take two waters and you take one water then? I think that sounds fair, since you compromised on food. Sounds like a deal! I'm glad we could come to a compromise 🙂 Me too 🙂 Thanks for making it easy and pleasant.  Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello, what are your preferences for extra supplies?  I am greatly in need of food and water.  We will be doing a lot of activity in a hot, dry climate.🙂 I prefer firewood because I will get cold at night. I forgot blankets ☹️ Would it work for you, then, to give me the three food and three water, and I can give you all of the firewood? No. Because I brought a water purifier but don't plan on hunting or fishing. So I'd be willing to give up all the water but I want 2 of the food. I see.  I also greatly need the extra food, as I indicated. Perhaps there are some convenience or grocery stores near your campground--you might then purchase extra food there and not have to carry it with you on your trip?   I believe there won't be any convenience stores around to buy food, And I plan on staying out longer than you so I will need more food to last me, Do you need food or water more? How do you know you are staying longer than me? I haven't even said how long I am staying! I am also with a big group.  ☹️☹️  I need food the most, and I would like to take at least 2 extra waters.  I could possibly give up one of the food packages if you could part with 2 firewood.  Without extra food, I would have to do some fishing and cook the fish. No. I won't part with any firewood because I can't stand being cold, and you can have 2 foods if you have a larger group if you give me 1 water. 🙂🙂 Sorry, that's not going to work for me.  ☹️ You have a water purifier? Doesn't sound like extra water is necessary.  I am in a hot, dry climate.  I can give up all the firewood to you, if you can leave me the three packages of food.  I would also like 2 waters.   Sorry but I'm willing to give up all the water for 1 food at least. I already mentioned above that I don't plan on hunting or fishing and I plan on being out for a while. That's my final offer. Okay, I will leave you all the firewood and 1 food, and I will take two food and three water packages. I am willing to finalize that.☹️ Submit-Deal

Hi, are you excited for the camping trip? Hello! I am very excited!🙂 How about you? Yes!  Would you mind sharing your highest priority item with me?  My most valued item right now is Food actually I am willing to share everything. Awesome.  I would prefer getting 3 of my highest priority item though, and maybe you could get 3 of your highest priority item? I  wood really like the firewood as I am afraid of the dark and would like my fire to last all night.  Oh that makes total sense.  I need the food so badly since I am bringing my family with me and they are one hungry bunch aha.  Would you be amenable to me having 3 food packets and you having 3 firewood packets? That would work great. How about water? What is your preference for that? Aha well I guess clearly my preference would be getting 2 water packages and you getting 1?  I know we can't split exactly evenly, but this way we each get our top priorities at least I would be good with that. We both would get what we really want. And I am okay with getting less water. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello! Hello, how are you doing today? i am doing great! how about you? I'm doing pretty well, just preparing for this camping trip. ME as well! we are a group of big eaters, and are looking to take lots of food. That is fair as there is no showers or sinks at my campsite so I am looking to take water :)  We will likely also need to take water too. Need to be able to wash up. That is fair, I also will need a good bit of firewood to keep warm as the campsite is in a colder area. We dont care much for campfires. Leaves your cloths smelling for days! Alright so I think we can make a fair deal here where we both will be happy 🙂 Submit-Deal Reject-Deal Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

How are you today? Did you have any preferences on the supplies we will be trading? I am good. How about yourself? I think I would like some firewood to start off with. We like to have bigger fires. What about you? I am good as well. That is good to hear that you like to have bigger fires as we do not care much for that. We would much rather have some extra water. Water is a little important to us too though , if possible maybe we can split that or maybe we can get some more food in replacement. That may be possible.... 🙂 What did you have in mind for the food replacement?  You can have all the water if we can have all the food? I dont think I am okay with that ☹️. Food is essential to our groups morale when camping. We would like 1 additional food preferably. Well you guys did say you did not care much about large fires. What if you gave all the firewood in replace for the water and you can still keep 1 food? So I would get 3 water and 1 food and youd get 3 firewood and 2 food? Yea that seems like an alright trade to me 🙂 Hmm... alright then 🙂. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello, how are you today? 🙂 good, how are you 🙂 Great!  I'm on a camping trip with my five children, how about you? I'm also going camping with my two children and 2 of my nephews  How would you like to divide the supplies? Well what do you need the most of? I need the most firewood due to a congenital issue that results in us having poor blood circulation to our extremities, thus making them susceptible to frostbite in the cold! Oh dear, that sounds serious!  Well I need food the most because my children eat sooo much and I don't think I packed enough.  How about I'll give you all my firewood in exchange for all your food? Would you be down for an arrangement where I get 2 wood, I get 1 food, and 1 water? Sure that sounds good!  I hope you have a nice trip! you too! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

hello! Hello. Can i kindly know your preferences please? Well, I'm kind of low on water, so I'd like to get as much of that as I can. I'd like to go hiking and I don't really have enough water for a long trip. What about you? Ohh nice.I also have the same issue around here.The thirst for water is growing high than ever due to drought Well, that's a bummer. How are you set for food? While I wouldn't mind a bit more, I'm in pretty good shape there, so I'd be willing to trade it for water. I'd hate to leave without getting a good hike in. Hun,It's a bit of a fair deal,but due to the condition here i will need a bit more of water though foo cannot be overlooked also for survival but still to survive we take chances.So do you mind me giving you a package of food and u trading 2 pakages of water?. Well, I tell you what, I'd be willing to take 2 packages of water and 2 of firewood and leave the rest to you, including all of the food. How does that sound?🙂 ok nice good deal Well, alright, then, I think we have a deal, nice and easy. It was a pleasure doing business with you. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

hi how are you are you ready for your trip I'm ready, I just would like to have a little extra stuff. How about you? yes I could use some extra food since i am hiking with my kids and they all have a friend that comes along...lol I know how that goes...We are planning on hiking too and we could also use some extra food. well I am sure between you and me we will find a way.... I really need some food, but I could also use extra firewood. It is supposed to be pretty cold at night and we would love to cook up some smores. I hear you we have the same issues well you can have either 2 food or 2 firewood what would you prefer? I would prefer 2 food. I could give you 1 food, 2 firewood and 2 water? that sounds like a good deal to me,  Okay, that is great. Have fun! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi. I'm most interested in water. What's your highest priority? I really need water too. I have a young baby and will do a lot of washing. Okay. I'm not especially worried about food. What's your lowest priority? I have enough food too. Can I take 2 water, 1 firewood and 2 food? How about two water, 1 firewood and 1 food, since we both value water the most? Is that what you want or what you are offering? That's what I'm offering to you, but I think it's a fair deal, so I'd accept it myself, too. Fair enough. If that sounds good, just tell me which bundle you want. As you suggested, I will take 2 water 1 food and 1 firewood Awesome Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

My son has respiratory problems I'll definitely need that 😡😡😡 If you really need water, then can I have 2 firewood and 3 food then? No I really need food also ...at least I will take 3 food and 2 water and you can take remaining I'll let you take 3 food and 1 water, and I will take the rest. That sounds not bad...! Though I need at least 1 more water additional to that Okay, I will give you 3 food, 2 water, and I will take 1 water, 3 firewood That makes a deal... Thank YOU...!!!! Happy camping! I am definitely ok with giving you two of the firewood!!  Why do you need 2 packages of food? I have a very fast metabolism and a dog to take care of. Thanks for the firewood. Awe!  We have a dog as well, I love dogs!!  How about if you get 1 package of food, 1 water and 2 firewood?  Would that be sufficient for you? I know I will need at least 2 packages of food. But you can have 2 of water. I'm so sorry, we're getting very close to the end and will need to make a decision very soon!  We can go without any firewood so How about you get all 2 firewood, 2 water and 1 food.  I will really need at least 2 packages of food for all of us. That works for me Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi, this is my first time camping and I want to make sure I have enough stuff.  I would like three food, three firewood, and two water.  What do you think? I have been camping a few times and pretty much know what I need to be comfortable and healthy.  Warmth and hydration are important for me.  So, I am thinking 2 firewood, 2 water and 0 food. Since I have never been camping before, why do you think you need 2 firewood? Unfortunately, I have arthritis so being sure to keep warm and the dampness away in the evening, heat is important for me. Ok.  I am worried about animals and bugs so I would prefer 2 firewood.  But I am happy with the 3 food🙂 Ok, how about we shift a bit as I hear you on the bugs and animals.  I think I can get by with one firewood and use extra covers and meds.  But, will need plenty of water and some food.  How about I take 1 firewood, 2 water and 2 food. Ok, although I was thinking that I could probably find some firewood, but would prefer more water so I don't get dehydrated and can use it to wash and cook.  How about I take 1 firewood, 2 water, and 1 food Good thought on finding your own firewood.  I appreciate the offer of 2 firewood.  I can cut back on water for washing/cooking.  So how about I take 2 firewood, 1 water and 2 food ok that sounds fine🙂 Great, thanks for understanding and working with me....and enjoy your first time camping🙂 no problem🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello there Hello. How are you? Great and yourself? Ready for this camping trip and take a break from modern civilization? I'm doing well. Yes. This camping trip is badly needed! I couldn't agree more. I feel that camping and hiking are both such spiritual experiences. It's such a perfect time to connect with our lord and savior. I understand and appreciate the difficult situation you find yourself in. How many packages of food and water do you think you will need for your additional guests? How much wood do you need since you are saying you don't need much? Thanks for your understanding well I think if possible then to meet the situation then how bout 3 food and 2 water then you get all the wood ? That way you can have awesome campfires lasting through the night, we will be going to sleep extra early to wake up very early so we do not need all that wood, as much as we need food to replenish our energy and be ready for another day of long walks to see as much as we can from nature 🙂 I agree with you that campfires are awesome and I do find them to be be quite useful. I'm not as early of a riser as you are unfortunately! 🙂 I'm willing to accept your offer o
